Fire damages $3 million dining car of The Ghan in Adelaide

Updated April 05, 2015 19:18:24

Photo: Fire crews were called when a blaze broke out in a Ghan rail car. (ABC News)
Map: Keswick 5035

Fire has damaged a $3 million dining car of The Ghan at the main Adelaide interstate rail terminal at Keswick.

Topics: fires, disasters-and-accidents, arson, keswick-5035, adelaide-5000, sa, jamestown-5491, whyalla-5600

First posted April 05, 2015 09:21:16
